Articles.Content: The challenge is stack as many kerbals on top of each other on top of the Mun Arch ( Either one) then orbit a ship and smack into the tower of kerbals
haha sounds like a very challenging task but should be fun seeing some results of peoples attempts.

Ha ha, is that even possible?

Not on kerbin for stacks more than two or three kerbals. Unless you made some stairs of sort. Then it's fairly possible.

The stacking bit is, with a bit of patience I've gotten 5 kerbals stacked.

EDIT: on the Mun.
I've had a similar idea for an orbit challenge: Get two ships in the same orbit, then play some "orbital baseball", use the turning of the ship to flick an EVA Kerbal between the two ships.
